forecast.name: Today
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog and a chance of rain before 10am, then rain and areas of fog between 10am and 5pm, then rain and snow. Cloudy. High near 36, with temperatures falling to around 34 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 3 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow before 1am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 21, with temperatures rising to around 23 overnight. North wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Open this weekend January 25th and 26th from 10 a.m. until 5 p.m. (final rental at 4 p.m.) Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.  Trails will not be groomed at this time.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, January 28, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Golf course trails, Hawk Hills and Coyote Run, were rolled on January 24, 2025.  When skiing the golf course trails please ski on designated marked trails only.  All other trails have not been groomed due to very limited snowfall.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks was in good shape from 12:30-1:30, given the warm up. Full coverage on the connector, two sets of tracks in the woods. Skate deck was getting soft when I finished up, but that's to be expected when it'd 44 degrees and full sun. Not sure what it will be like for the after-work crowd, but it should firm up real nice after the warm up. Two HUGE piles of snow should keep us skiing for a while.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: The red & blue trails were groomed up nicely after yesterday's snowfall. We skate skied both this morning while the current round of snow was falling which slowed things down a lot.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 5 lifts and the rope tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and will be packed this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: It's a great ski day at Nub's Nob with excellent grooming. The temperature should rise to nearly 40 degrees this afternoon. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 9 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob!
